app.api.user.schema

Module Contents

Classes

UserCreate

UserCreate is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /user route.

A class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /login route.

This is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /admin/login route.

UserResponse is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /login route.

GetUser is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /user/{userId} route.

Follower is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /user/{userId}/followers route.

UserBaseResponse is a class that is used to validate the data that is being passed to the /user/{userId} route.

blank_string(value: str, field)

The blank_string function returns a string of length n, where n is the input value. If no input is given, it returns an empty string.

Parameters

  • value:str – Used to Specify the type of data that will be passed to the function.

  • field – Used to Specify the field to be used in the function.

Returns

A string with a blank space in it.

phone_number(value: str, field)

The phone_number function takes a string and returns the phone number in standard North American Numbering Plan (NANP) format. The NANP is a standard for the numbering of North American telephone numbers, which includes Canada and the United States. This function will accept input with or without an area code, but it will always return output with an area code.

Parameters

  • value:str – Used to Pass the value of the field being validated.

  • field – Used to Access the field name of the value that is being validated.

Returns

A string containing the phone number in e.

username_validator(value: str, field)

The username_validator function checks to see if the username contains any special characters. If it does, then an exception is raised.

Parameters

  • value:str – Used to Specify the value of a field.

  • field – Used to Access the field that is being validated.

Returns

A string.
